page.title: 12Day in My Life 2
page.content:
We went along the East Lancs Road, up Newearth Road, past the Red Lion and right along the bankings again. Then we turned left onto Bedford field, went up onto Bedford Avenue and into school. We went up the field and back and then had a glass of lemonade. 10.15am I went home and had a cup of coffee and a read. 12.00 I had my dinner, then washed up. 2.00pm Stuart and dad came home and we watched TV. 6.30pm Mum made tea. We had hamburger, sausages and chips and wine and some buns. 7.00 We watched TV 9.00pm I went to bed
Neil, who wrote this is 10 years old and did the run as part of a sponsored event from school, to raise money for Manchester Children's Hospital.
